name: cmc_scrape_rankings
description: Scrape the top cryptocurrency rankings from CoinMarketCap. Returns coin name, symbol, price, market cap, 24h volume, and 24h price change for the top coins.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of coins to scrape (default '20', max '100')

steps.label: Wait for rankings table to load

steps.code: const limit = parseInt('{{limit}}') || 20; const coins = []; const rows = document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(rows.length, limit); i++) { const row = rows[i]; const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td'); if (cells.length < 7) continue; const rank = cells[1] ? cells[1].textContent.trim() : String(i + 1); const nameCell = cells[2]; const linkEl = nameCell ? nameCell.querySelector('a[href*="/currencies/"]') : null; const allPs = nameCell ? nameCell.querySelectorAll('p') : []; let name = ''; let symbol = ''; if (allPs.length >= 2) { name = allPs[0].textContent.trim(); symbol = allPs[1].textContent.trim(); } else if (linkEl) { const parts = linkEl.textContent.trim().split(/\s+/); name = parts[0] || ''; symbol = parts[1] || ''; } else if (nameCell) { const parts = nameCell.textContent.trim().split(/\n/).map(function(s) { return s.trim(); }).filter(Boolean); name = parts[0] || ''; symbol = parts[1] || ''; } const priceCell = cells[3]; const price = priceCell ? priceCell.textContent.trim() : ''; const change1hCell = cells[4]; const change1h = change1hCell ? change1hCell.textContent.trim() : ''; const change24hCell = cells[5]; const change24h = change24hCell ? change24hCell.textContent.trim() : ''; const change7dCell = cells[6]; const change7d = change7dCell ? change7dCell.textContent.trim() : ''; const marketCapCell = cells[7]; const marketCap = marketCapCell ? marketCapCell.textContent.trim() : ''; const volumeCell = cells[8]; const volume = volumeCell ? volumeCell.textContent.trim() : ''; coins.push({ rank: rank, name: name, symbol: symbol, price: price, change_1h: change1h, change_24h: change24h, change_7d: change7d, market_cap: marketCap, volume_24h: volume, url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { scraped_count: coins.length, coins: coins }
steps.name: rankings_data
steps.label: Extract coin rankings
